Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package docker-buildx for versions less than 0.14.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package docker-buildx for versions less than 0.14.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package docker-buildx is earlier than 0.14.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-24786
